name: black and white (zetef)
description:
stage of project: prototype

you are a little hard that can change between black and white. your goal is to put the black and white tiles in the right spot. while opposite colours repel, the same colours attract, meaning you can attach to different tiles at once, or repel them from your surroundings .

controls:

move: arrow keys

action: x

exit/menu: escape

(you can press either f1 or f2 to switch between different levels)

P.S.: I know the source code is a mess, that's why it's in prototype stage.
